mapper.select: SELECT user.user_role AS memberType, user.user_name AS name, user.user_login_id AS loginId, user.user_phone AS phone FROM user WHERE user.user_pay_status = 1

SELECT user.user_role AS memberType, user.user_name AS name, user.user_login_id AS loginId, user.user_phone AS phone FROM user
WHERE 1 = 1 and user.user_pay_status = 1
AND REPLACE(TRIM(LOWER(user.user_name)), '-', '') = REPLACE(TRIM(#{keyword}), '-', '')
AND TRIM(LOWER(user.user_login_id)) LIKE CONCAT('%', TRIM(LOWER(#{keyword})), '%')
AND TRIM(LOWER(user.user_phone)) LIKE CONCAT('%', TRIM(LOWER(#{keyword})), '%')
-- 기본 검색 없음

SELECT usr.user_id AS userId, usr.user_role AS memberType, usr.user_name AS name, usr.user_login_id AS loginId, usr.user_phone AS phone FROM ( SELECT user_id FROM user
user.user_pay_status = 1
AND user.user_id > #{cursor}
ORDER BY user_id ASC LIMIT #{size} ) AS temp JOIN user usr ON usr.user_id = temp.user_id
